item.title: The Turing Way
item.description: The Turing Way is an online handbook - and global community - dedicated to fostering gold-standard reproducible research. It’s a cultural movement with the potential to transform data science. There is a crisis of reproducibility in science. ‘Publish-or-perish’ incentives and excessive data secrecy stifles progress and wastes resources: siloed science is slow science. The Turing Way is an evolving online ‘handbook’ on how to conduct world-leading, reproducible research in academic data science and AI with the goal of making reproducible science “too easy not to do”.
